colmagi.notVisitedDlg: A big show is taking place at the Colosseum today. You enter the arena and hold the audience in awe with your magical prowess. Insatiable hunger for knowledge is what makes a true mage, so you gladly accept the first prize, which is one of the newest academical handbooks.
colmagi.visitedDlg: Moderator of the Colosseum instantly recognizes you but respectfully denies entrance to the competitor zone. You probably should rather be featuring as a talent judge here!
colmagi.name: Colosseum of the Magi
